branchCategory.name: High Rigidity
branchCategory.description: The LESH electric actuator combines a motor and ball screw drive, worktable, and linear guide in compact body. The machined table is more rigid than the LES formed table, enabling higher horizontal loads and improved deflection from offset loading. Body orientations include basic, symmetrical, and inline mounted motor.

branchItem.name: LESH, Electric Actuator, Slide Table Type
branchItem.description: The LESH electric actuator combines a motor and ball screw drive, worktable, and linear guide in compact body. The machined table is more rigid than the LES formed table, enabling higher horizontal loads and improved deflection from offset loading. Body orientations include basic, symmetrical, and inline mounted motor.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>Body sizes: 8, 16, 25 <LI>Strokes: 50, 75, 100, 150 (availability dependent on size) <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.05 <LI>Motor can be mounted internally with a right or left table, or in-line <LI>Motor types: high load step motor or high speed servo motor
</LI></UL>
